hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that :the Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) said: “When you give Zakat, do not forget its reward, and say 'Allahummaj-'alha maghnaman wa la taj-'alha maghrama (O Allah! Make it a gain and do not make it a loss).' ” (Maudu)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُقَالُ عِنْدَ إِخْرَاجِ الزَّكَاةِ
chapter.eng-name: What is to be said when Zakat is paid
